name: Movenpick Resort Aswan
address: Elephantine Island | PO Box 62, Aswan 81111, Egypt
features:
Pool
Room Service
Restaurant
Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room
Bar/Lounge
Spa
Free High Speed Internet (WiFi)
Breakfast included
description: Nestled on its own Arcadian island in the Nile and a five-minute boat ride from the center of Aswan and its ancient monuments, the Mövenpick Resort Aswan is a photographer’s delight. Nearby Kitchener’s Island is the setting for a mature botanical garden with species from all points of the globe. The resort is a 25-minute drive from Aswan Airport and then a 5 minute boat trip across the Nile to Elephantine Island. Opposite the city of Aswan, the Mövenpick Resort Aswan provides a tranquil environment of lush tropical gardens and magnificent views of the river
StyleandPrice:
HOTEL STYLE
Mountain View
Great View
priceRange: EGP 1,818 - EGP 5,365 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)

name: AnaKato
address: Gharb Soheil | El Noba, Gharb Seheyl, Aswan 81526, Egypt
features:
Restaurant
Free High Speed Internet (WiFi)
Airport Transportation
Babysitting
Breakfast Available
Concierge
Dry Cleaning
Laundry Service
description: It is an authentic hotel on the west shore of the river Nile of Aswan featuring the magnificent Nubian culture and by the way Anakato means “our home’’. It consists of 3 Nubian houses (Wer, Owy and Toski) characterized by the colorful decorations illustrating the Nubian civilization. Everything in the place is different! The amazing Nile view hugged by the desert gives you a great chance to isolate yourself from the daily hectic routine and just enjoy the tranquility and nature. Every inch in the place represents the Nubian culture; the walls, the rooms, the passage and the food as well . You will find countless activities to enjoy at the Anakato hotel ; a boat ride to discover the river Nile‘s mysteries, sand boarding, a camel ride, Nubian folklore, natural therapies like sand burial to cure various diseases such as rheumatism and rheumatoid arthritis and masks which will leave your skin silky smooth.
priceRange: EGP 1,271 - EGP 3,212 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)

description: The only guesthouse in Aswan on the West bank. Top location near the Nile, the desert and the Nubian villages; beautiful view. Private chef services healthy meals. Peaceful atmosphere, friendly, hospitable staff. “Feels like staying with family”; “a home away from home”.2 floors, 8 double rooms, 1 family room, beautiful garden, roof garden with restaurant; marvellous view. The local ferry - within walking distance from the guesthouse - brings you in 10 min. in Aswan centre.
priceRange: EGP 494 - EGP 882 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)

description: Our guest house "Hadouta Masreya" or "An Egyptian tale" is tucked into the golden sand dunes that roll down and form the west bank of the Nile and is located at the heart of Naj' Gharb Soheil overlooking the Nile. At Hadouta Masreya, you will have an unmatched experience of relaxation, fun and simplicity all in style!

description: Welcome to Memnon Hotel, a 2 star hotel in front of the Nile River in the center of Aswan close to Bazaars. We have 54 clean rooms with private baths and have air conditioning, most of them have a fantastic Nile View, some of them have Fridges and Tvs. We offer 4 types of rooms single, double, triple and suites. We have a friendly and helpful reception staff 24 hours always available to help you with arranging tours, making travel bookings and international telephone calls and faxes with the cheapest prices. The hotel has Internet access offers 1 hour with 5 Egyptian pounds. We arrange a free pickup from Aswan train station to protect the guest from disturbance of the people at the train station. IMPORTANT NOTE: The Hotel is not responsible for anyone a guest meets at the train station saying that he works for the hotel. We are pleased to offer you our services!
priceRange: EGP 247 - EGP 353 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)

name: Nubian Holiday House Aswan
address: West Bank, Al-Coba, Beside Noble Tombs, Aswan 8111, Egypt
features:
Free High Speed Internet (WiFi)
Free Parking
Breakfast included
Airport Transportation
Breakfast Available
Business Center with Internet Access
Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly)
Conference Facilities
description: Our small hotel is located in the heart of our Nubian village. With four spacious rooms, we have converted our old family home into a beautiful house on the Nile. Our main aim is to let you experience Nubian hospitality, we will go out of our way to make sure your stay is both enjoyable and relaxing. At Nubian Holiday House we can provide you the full package (or as much of it as you need). This includes organising private tours both on land and on the Nile, all at competitive prices - see below - through our network of local guides and drivers. (We will ensure everyone speaks a high quality of English!). Key benefits of staying with us: - free wifi in all rooms - free tea & coffee - free laundry service - free breakfast Airport taxi pickup is available for 175 egyptian pounds (or $25), for 1-3 people. 3 rooms with Nile view, 1 with garden view (but has hot tub) Examples of tours available: - 2 night/3 day felucca (boat) tour to Kombo temple (approximately 1500 pounds Egyptian pounds for a boat which can carry 1-3 people) After this, we can organise onward transport to Luxor, visiting Edfu temple (aprox. 500 EYP) - Abu Simbel (shared aprox. 200, private aprox. 850) - Highdam, Obelisk & Phliae temple (aprox. 230 for 2 people) - Nubian Museum (walkable, extra guide for aprox. EYP 70) - Half day boat tour (aprox. EYP 90/hour, for an entire private boat with capacity of 8)
priceRange: EGP 582 - EGP 971 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
